item.description:
I think this event I'm hosting will be of interest to many of our Meetup group's members. You might remember when I led one of our meetings on social media networking. This workshop will be about networking in general.

WORKSHOP: Networking Secrets from an Ex-Wallflower - in 3-D!
Monday, Oct. 4, 2010, 6-8:30pm
Northampton, MA
Pre-registration required

FACILITATOR: Val Nelson, Career & Business Coach, of Northampton MA
http://www.valnelson....

Networking is a major part of achieving any career or business goal. Yet introverts and others are apt to avoid it, even at the expense of their dreams! It’s time to change that with this unique workshop.

Register here: http://www.valnelson....

You’ll come away with relaxed shoulders, new tricks to avoid common traps, a concrete plan, and some new connections!

“This presenter doesn’t force you to be what you’re not. She provides realistic strategies to work with who you are.” ~Anonymous

WHAT's Included:
1. Networking Workshop
2. Networking Workbook
3. Individual Session with Career & Business Coach Val Nelson to finalize your unique networking plan.

Designed for and approved by introverts. :-)
Extroverts welcome too.

COST: $65 if registered by Sept. 20th ($75 after)
(If the workshop, workbook, and session were bought separately, the total value is $145.)


IMPORTANT:
Replying in this group will NOT reserve your spot but please RSVP here too.
Advanced registration is REQUIRED at http://www.valnelson....

WHO SHOULD ATTEND:
Anyone who wants more ease and more impact when networking.

TOPICS COVERED:

1. The 3 Secrets to Networking for Introverts
2. Tapping into Introvert Superpowers for Networking
3. Creating Your Unique Networking Plan: Who, What, When, Where

Besides my own experience of going from hating to enjoying networking, I will share what I have found works when providing coaching for introverts. They're now enjoying networking and getting results from it!

Introvert Superpowers… ACTIVATE!
item.how_to_find_us: Must pre-register for ticket and details.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Workshop: Networking Secrets from an Ex-Wallflower - in 3-D!
